meanings.definition: One who engages in casual conversation or small talk.
meanings.sent1: The office shmoozer always has a story to share during lunch.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the neighborhood shmoozer because she talks to everyone she meets.
meanings.sent3: The party was so quiet until the shmoozer arrived and livened things up.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed effortlessly, turning her into a social shmoozer in no time.
meanings.sent5: The shmoozer's friendly chatter made the room feel warm and welcoming.

meanings.definition: To engage in friendly or persuasive conversation.
meanings.sent1: He loves to shmooze with customers to make them feel comfortable.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, she tried to shmooze her way into getting more time for her project.
meanings.sent3: The salesman managed to shmooze his client into signing the deal.
meanings.sent4: She could shmooze her way out of any difficult situation with her charm.
meanings.sent5: The politician knew how to shmooze the crowd with his captivating speeches.

meanings.definition: A person skilled at making small talk or socializing.
meanings.sent1: She is a natural shmoozer, effortlessly connecting with everyone she meets.
meanings.sent2: The party wouldn't be as lively without the resident shmoozer keeping conversations going.
meanings.sent3: The shy introvert secretly admired the social skills of the office shmoozer.
meanings.sent4: He transformed from a shy wallflower to a confident shmoozer at social events.
meanings.sent5: The talented shmoozer could strike up a conversation with anyone, anywhere.
